pageContext.claim: “I had such a great relationship [with Queen Elizabeth II] and we were laughing and having fun. Her people told me she hasn't had so much fun in 25 years. Now, then I got criticized for it because they said we were having too much fun. It doesn’t matter, but we have a great relationship and I had a great relationship with Charles, and honestly I have a very good relationship with a lot of the foreign leaders.”
pageContext.analysis: This is not a credible claim Trump makes about his interactions with Queen Elizabeth II.
